title: Count of IWPs by Status
rationale: Shows how many IWPs exist for each status category.

title: Total Tag Quantity per IWP
rationale: Ranks IWPs by total tag quantities.

title: Planned Tag Quantities Over Time by CWP
rationale: Tracks tag workload trends over time for each CWP.

title: Stacked Tag Count Over Time by Status
rationale: Shows cumulative tag counts over time grouped by IWP status.

title: Tag Quantity Share by CWP
rationale: Visualizes how total tag quantity is split among CWPs.

title: Planned IWP Timelines by CWP
rationale: Shows planned project durations by IWP grouped by CWP.

title: Planned vs Actual Finish Dates by IWP
rationale: Compares planned and actual finish dates to highlight delays.

title: Actual Finish Date vs Tag Quantity by CWP
rationale: Explores correlation between completion time and tag workload.

title: Distribution of Total Tag Quantities
rationale: Shows how tag quantities are spread across IWPs.
